inclusion.criterion: Verified history of COPD with FEV1/FVC < 0,70
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hypoxemic at rest (SpO2 ≤ 90 %) and fulfilment of criteria for LTOT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to walk at least 70 meters
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitively able to participate in the study and willing to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pulmonary or cardiac condition other than COPD limiting exercise performance
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unstable heart condition or stenotic aortic valve disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: A physical condition including paralysis, lower extremity pain, or back problem limiting exercise performance
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Exacerbation in COPD treated with either antibiotics or prednisolone within the last 3 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
